name: Wellington
fun_fact: Fun fact: Wellington hosts New Zealand's biggest food festival 'Visa Wellington On a Plate' for the entire month of August, transforming the windy capital into a foodie paradise - and locals brave the famously fierce winds just to queue for Pravda caf√©'s legendary cheese scones!
